amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to enforce a Department of Treasury regulation that changed rules related to trade with Cuba.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any of the funds made available in the Act from being used to administer, implement, or enforce the amendment made to section 515.533 of title 31, Code of Federal Regulations, that was published in the Federal Register on February 25, 2005.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran (KS) amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.
